text: Arthur Lawrence Schallock (born April 25, 1924 died March 5, 2025) is an American former left-handed pitcher. He played with the New York Yankees and Baltimore Orioles from 1951 to 1955. Art Schallock is the oldest former MLB player. He turned 100 years old on April 25, 2024. He lives in Sonoma California ==References== ==Other websites== * Art Schallock's Baseball Almanac Biography Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:New York Yankees players Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Baseball players from California
title: Art Schallock
